item.title: Issue Let's Encrypt certificate using HTTP-01 challenge
item.description: New to Voyager? Please start here. Issue Let’s Encrypt certificate using HTTP-01 challenge Deploy Voyager operator Install Voyager operator in your cluster following the steps here. Create Ingress We are going to use a nginx server as the backend. To deploy nginx server, run the following commands: kubectl run nginx --image=nginx kubectl expose deployment nginx --name=web --port=80 --target-port=80 Now create Ingress ing.yaml kubectl apply -f https://raw.
